divs: sighting detailssighting report: i just wanted to let mufon know that i ve got some "real" insight into current activity (ufo) and that on any given night here in los angeles i can point out at-least one in the night sky. i was even allowed by "them" to witness a space craft upclose and right in the flight\landing path for airplanes at the burbank airport back in 2003. no other details on here. let me just say it was 50 feet above me.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around April 7th 2005
